description: An object containing the id of a protocol to be inserted by reference. Note that there are several special references: '@END_SUBPROTOCOL' stops the current protocol gracefully; and '@END_ALL' stops the entire exam gracefully.

reference.description: Protocol id or special reference ('@END_SUBPROTOCOL', '@END_ALL') to include

skipIf.description: JavaScript function returning true/false based on previous result (i.e. `"result.response === 'B'"`) or previously set flags (i.e. "flags.skipPage1", see `setFlags` field in the page definition).  If true, this question is skipped.
